General.Name: Khee San Bhd
General.Description: Khee San Berhad, an investment holding company, manufactures and distributes sweets and candies in Malaysia. It offers sweets and candies, such as chewy candies under the Fruitplus, Choco Plus, Mintplus, Victory, Snackie, Sochews, and Milk Plus brand names; deposited candies under the S'creams and Victory brand names; chewing gums under the Victory brand name; hard candies under the Torrone, Snackie, Kiss Me, BonBon, Fizzy, Salt Plus, Salt & Lemon, Comilk, Nini Drop, Crystal Pop, and Golly Pop brand names; tablets under the Bento brand name; and bubble gums under the 88 Super Bubble Gum brand name. The company also exports its products to approximately 30 countries, including Hong Kong, Vietnam, Japan, South Africa, and the other Asia Pacific countries. It sells its products through wholesalers, hypermarket chain stores, and convenient stores. Khee San Berhad was incorporated in 1994 and is headquartered in Seri Kembangan, Malaysia.
